external_references.source_name: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence VMWare ESXi Zero-Day 2023
external_references.description: Alexander Marvi, Brad Slaybaugh, Ron Craft, and Rufus Brown. (2023, June 13). VMware ESXi Zero-Day Used by Chinese Espionage Actor to Perform Privileged Guest Operations on Compromised Hypervisors. Retrieved March 26, 2025.
Marvi, A. et al.. (2023, March 16). Fortinet Zero-Day and Custom Malware Used by Suspected Chinese Actor in Espionage Operation. Retrieved March 22, 2023.

objects.description: [UNC3886](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1048) has established remote SSH access to targeted ESXi hosts.(Citation: Google Cloud Threat Intelligence VMWare ESXi Zero-Day 2023)(Citation: Mandiant Fortinet Zero Day)
